title: Steering Toward the Future: Andover's Framework for 21st-Century Learning
description: PWV engages in the AI community through education-focused conversations, General partner DT, as an Andover alum, learns about his alma mater's skills-first teaching approach to AI in education. Examples included using AI as simulation for oral exam practice, the 'seven-prompt essay' grading conversation logs rather than AI output, and students creating fake historical documents to strengthen critical thinking.
